UC Riverside Instructor Survey

A student made survey for professors and lecturers that have taught at UCR

About Me

Kristoffer Hernandez

Hello, my name is Kristoffer Hernandez, a Fall 2021 graduate. I took STAT130 Survey Analysis during Fall 2021 and was inspired to use what I learned to create and analyze a survey of my own.

I used Python to scrape all necessary information, cleaned up the data and performed a stratified random sample using colleges as clusters (BCOE,CHASS,etc.).

This is my first website, so it only includes HTML & CSS. In the future, I plan to analyze and create visualizations using R and display what I learned on the website.

Thank you for taking the time to complete my survey!
